casebody.data:
No. 10-665. Donald Brown, Petitioner v. Kansas City Freightliner Sales, Inc., dba Joplin Freightliner Sales, et al. 562 U.S. 1217, 131 S. Ct. 1476,

179 L. Ed. 2d 301,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1492. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 617 F.3d 995.
